author: jwoolley
msg: Forward port of changes in mod_ssl for Apache 1.3 up through mod_ssl

author: jwoolley
msg: This test is failing for me.  This gives slightly more verbose -v output.

author: trawick
msg: fix a segfault and a window in which we could miss joining
we can't try to signal workers if the worker queue hasn't
make sure the start thread is done creating threads before
we try to join; otherwise we can just miss some of them and
not be able to clean them up properly

author: trawick
msg: don't wait nearly so long for child processes to go away
the adjustment of the wait time was done too soon
now the code should be consistent with 1.3 behavior
